mapper.insert: insert into filmbox_coupon ( member_id , product_no , coupon_count , coupon_price , coupon_lastdate , coupon_condition) values( #{member_id}, #{product_no}, #{coupon_count}, #{coupon_price}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 year), 0 )
mapper.select: select coupon_no , member_id , c.product_no , product_name , product_category , coupon_count , coupon_price , coupon_lastdate , coupon_condition from filmbox_coupon as c inner join filmbox_store as s on c.product_no = s.product_no where member_id = #{member_id} and coupon_condition = 0
